scripts.build_lambdas: npm run build-flowMapper && npm run build-sqsTrigger
scripts.rebuild-flowMapper: cd lambdas/flowMapper && rm flowMapper.zip && zip -r flowMapper .
scripts.rebuild-sqsTrigger: cd lambdas/sqsTrigger && rm sqsTrigger.zip && zip -r sqsTrigger .
scripts.rebuild_lambdas: npm run rebuild-flowMapper && npm run rebuild-sqsTrigger
